member.name: T:Project_1.Arithmetic
member.summary: The Arithmetic class Contains all the basic arithmetic methods

remarks.para: This class has methods for Addition, Substraction, Multiplication and Divison.

member.name: M:Project_1.Arithmetic.Add(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds two numbers and returns the sum

returns.para: returns the sum of two numbers

member.exception: Occurs when one of the number is more than the integer value

member.name: M:Project_1.Arithmetic.Substract(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Substracts two numbers and returns the difference

returns.para: returns of difference of two numbers

member.name: M:Project_1.Arithmetic.Multiply(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Multiplies two numbers and returns the product

returns.para: returns the product of two numbers

member.exception: Occurs when one of the number is more than the integer value

member.name: M:Project_1.Arithmetic.Divide(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Divides two numbers and returns the quotient

returns.para: returns the quotient of two numbers

member.exception: Occurs when a number is attemted to be divided by zero

member.name: T:Project_1.Program
member.summary: This is the main class where all the methods are declared and implemented.
member.remarks: This class can add and print the sum.
